column1: * 1916 - The Battle of the Somme ends. Neither side wins. J.R.R. Tolkien is officially stricken off as a casualty by his Batallion.
* 1976 - Voice actor Dominic Armato is born.
* 1980 - Unfinished Tales is published in the USA.
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
* 2008 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria is released.

column3: travel up the Dry River and approach Gondolin.
